alert.note: Alert for Bucks (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 12 at 5:54PM EDT until August 12 at 6:15PM EDT by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 615 PM EDT FOR CENTRAL BUCKS COUNTY... At 554 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Chalfont, or 21 miles north of Philadelphia, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to vehicles is possible. Wind damage to roofs, siding, trees, and power lines is possible. Locations impacted include... Perkasie, Doylestown, Bedminster, Chalfont, Tinicum, New Hope, Dublin, Stockton, Fricks, Pipersville, Gardenville, Richboro, Sellersville, New Britain, Silverdale, Brittany Farms-Highlands and Newtown Grant. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
